thread.title: Wonderful!
thread.title_full: Wonderful! - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MatthewLoop
title: Wonderful!
text:
Wonderful location close to the Arc and Champs Elysees! This was our second time staying here. Great service. The staff was helpful in guiding us to the right people to book amazing excursions throughout France. I would recommend this hotel to
Room Tip: Opt for the Privil√®ge room that has direct views of the Arc from the bedroom and bathroom. Absolutel... See more room tips
